entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Halifax
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:42 AM AST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Halifax Stanfield Int'l Airport 04:00 AM AST Thursday 19 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -0.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 96 %

Dewpoint: -1.0°C

Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 19 January 2023
